title: How to Migrate CentOS 7 to AlmaLinux
author: Jack Wallen
description: CentOS 7 is dead. It was a fun ride but it's over. One easy upgrade path is migrating to AlmaLinux. It is easier than you think. Here's how.
cntitle: 如何将 CentOS 7 迁移到 AlmaLinux
cndescription: CentOS 7 已寿终正寝。虽然旅程愉快，但它已经结束了。迁移到 AlmaLinux 是一个简单的升级路径。它比你想象的更容易。以下是操作方法。
